website_summaries.verdict: This 3-pack contains rolls printed with different patterns on the back for a total of 6 designs.
pros: Paper has a good heft and luster
Works for multiple occasions, and it also gives a very stylish look when the inside of the gift paper is printed, too
Birthday balloon print is another option
cons: A few customers received rolls that differed from the ones pictured

customer_reviews.title: Great wrapping paper - heavy
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrapping paper , I usually buy this at Christmas in huge rolls at our local Sams Club. I have not seen any in the stores for the birthday theme. But it is great heavy paper - and double sided - so you can wrap 6 different designs - would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene

customer_reviews.title: Irritated Beyond Belief
customer_reviews.text: I’m pretty angry at this point looking at the pic I posted I DID not get the role of wrapping paper I wanted the most with the cupcakes and flowers. The whole point of choosing these 3 rolls of paper was because I wanted the one with the cupcakes and flowers then I get them and instead I get 2 of the same rolls!
customer_reviews.author: Armesia

customer_reviews.title: Great value and super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I am the party planning committee at my office and I bought these rolls for my coworkers gifts. I love that it's double sided! It gives me more options, but also makes it look super cute by having another design inside. The paper is not thin or cheap! It is nice and durable. It's also more youthful, which I like.
customer_reviews.author: WindyBradley

customer_reviews.title: The cupcake design is so cute!
customer_reviews.text: In love with this set! The sheets came beautifully packaged! They are double sided and quite thick! The quality feels great! However, you cannot manipulate them too much otherwise they will tear! I ordered this set for the cute cupcake design in particular! The beautiful wrapping papers made my sloppy gift wrapping job look good!😊
customer_reviews.author: Aparna AgarwalTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: Better than most!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely impressed with this wrapping paper. It’s super thick and reversible (although the reversible side that isn’t pictured is not nearly as pretty as the main side). There’s more paper than most wrapping paper that you buy in the store, but it’s still not one of those thick rolls. With the 3 rolls, we’ll probably only get two birthdays worth of presents out of it. It still beats the cheap $5 rolls that Target sells, though.
customer_reviews.author: MayBae

customer_reviews.title: Colors not vivid like in pics
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed that the color of the paper I received is not nearly as vivid as is depicted in the current ad pictures. Especially the wrapping that reads happy birthday. Colors Looks faded. But paper is sturdy, not too thin and not too thick. I had no issues with the paper tearing while wrapping. Paper is fine, usable, just wish the ad pics were more accurate regarding color.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: 6 wrapping papers for the price of 3!
customer_reviews.text: This headline is a bit misleading because there are only three rolls of paper, but with the reverse side of each roll there is a different, but complimentary paper. I love this style because it is so heavy and nice to wrap gifts in. I probably won't go back to just a single paper unless it is a heavier paper like this one is.
customer_reviews.author: Taron Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Better Than I Hoped
customer_reviews.text: I love the designs on both sides. There's a lot more paper than I expected. It does rip easily which surprised me for a Hallmark product.
customer_reviews.author: Pudden1949

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful And Durable
customer_reviews.text: I often don’t pay more than a dollar for a roll of wrapping paper, but this product was worth it. The paper is very durable and doesn’t easily rip while you are wrapping things with it. It also has beautiful 2-sided designs.
customer_reviews.author: DeannaD

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love that these are two sided so you get six wrapping paper options. It's especially nice to have both birthday and non-birthday options. I do wish there was more paper per roll, but for the price, I think this is a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler D

customer_reviews.title: Love Getting Two in One
customer_reviews.text: Every roll has two unique sides - it's like getting two rolls for the price of one (or six for the price of three). One side might be birthday but the opposite side could be used for other occasions like baby shower, wedding, anniversary, etc. Good thickness - no tearing while wrapping.
customer_reviews.author: smokyhillcandles

customer_reviews.title: Hallmark Wrapping Paper
customer_reviews.text: The designs are very colorful and, you can use both sides which makes it very versatile. The price is a little steep, however, it should withstand the rigors of mail handling of the mail! The paper is thick and a little hard to work with!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best wrapping paper Ive found.
customer_reviews.text: I love this wrapping paper and that it has two sides and you can use it for different things and the number of rolls that came makes it such that I can wrap different gifts different ways and it is amazing definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: JenJes

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy - Beautiful Colors
customer_reviews.text: This is a good buy. The ability to reverse the paper is nice. The paper is heavy and easy to work with. The colors are vibrant. I would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela V

customer_reviews.title: Thiccc
customer_reviews.text: wrapping paper is thick and cute, just like the pictures! love that its reversible
customer_reviews.author: M'kenna

customer_reviews.title: Nice and thick set of wrapping paper with beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this set of wrapping paper. It is 2 sided and very thick. Beautiful colors and wont rip or tear if you're wrapping a gift. I'd purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: Dimplezz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and easy to store
customer_reviews.text: The paper was beautiful for my mom's bday and what was left was easy to store in the box they arrived in. A+
customer_reviews.author: RACHEL Moreno

customer_reviews.title: So pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: I needed birthday wrapping paper for my daughter's birthday and in my opinion, you can never go wrong with Hallmark. The paper is wonderful, colorful, reversible, sturdy and easy to wrap with. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Yvy

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Paper
customer_reviews.text: This is not your normal thin wrapping paper. As usual, Hallmark has stepped up to the plate with a quality product. Not only is it sturdy paper, but it is double sided so your gifts may have different designs.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy S

customer_reviews.title: Great wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: I love the designs and colors. They are all reversible so we actually have 6 different patterns to choose from when wrapping gifts. It's very durable and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Bray

customer_reviews.title: Thick, and vesatile
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wrapping paper!! Thick and double sided with versatile patterns. Doesn't cause my sissors to catch when I slide to cut. Beautiful graphics!
customer_reviews.author: Montana Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, thick, double sided wrapping paper with cute designs. Nice quality. Arrived quickly! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie

customer_reviews.title: Cute, thick wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.text: This birthday paper has cute patterns. What I like most about it is that it’s easy to cut. Some wrapping papers too when cutting them—but this paper is thicker and of better quality and doesn’t. My daughter enjoys picking options for each of her buddies birthday gifts. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Matthews-Rauhala

customer_reviews.title: Nice thick paper
customer_reviews.text: Nice thick paper. Just wish it had one of the rolls with a boyish theme. 14 year old son not thrilled with cupcake paper for his birthday!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle W.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice colors and good value for money. I love the fact that it’s reversible so that it allows the usage both for birthdays and for other occasions!!
customer_reviews.author: FR

customer_reviews.title: Great paper !
customer_reviews.text: These were great , very pretty and sturdy and pretty and colorful - look great on packages
customer_reviews.author: Linda Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Reversible and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great wrapping paper and I love that each roll is reversible. It’s strong and durable, no tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Lindgren

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality wrapping paper, reversible, so you've got 6 patterns. A great value. Versatile enough for more than birthdays (Mother's Day, Father's Day, Valentine's Day, etc.). Very pleased with this!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Price

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal
customer_reviews.text: Love this paper. Much better than any at the store. Doesn't rip and tear when you are working with it. Will get it again.+
customer_reviews.author: Gaylo

customer_reviews.title: Great value, quality paper.
customer_reviews.text: Quality paper. Affordable price. Very pleased. Not just for birthdays.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Box only had one roll.
customer_reviews.text: Yup. One roll. Box came. I was really excited to open....and then grasp around in the box like a fool trying to find the other two. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Cassi

customer_reviews.title: Super idea & value
customer_reviews.text: Loved this paper! So easy to use. 3 rolls turns into 6 because it has a coordinating back. Great deal. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Judy in Oklahoma

customer_reviews.title: Mid life crisis : reviewing wrapping paper on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Never thought I’d be reviewing wrapping paper as a 30 year old man but here I am. This stuff was great. Very durable and versatile. It’s the little things that matter at this point in life and I’ll take what I can get.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great versatility.
customer_reviews.text: Great versatility. Durable. Comes in handy to have on hand. Especially great for short notice gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Great wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: Great wrapping paper that holds its folds. I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: BenSig

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again !
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and paper is printed on both sides Nice presentation
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: So cute!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this set of wrapping paper and that it’s double-sided.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Parten

customer_reviews.title: Good wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.text: Great wrapping Paper! I love that it is reversible!! You get double the value for a very good price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carlin M McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Gift Wrap
customer_reviews.text: Good strong paper and each roll is reversible. Great bargain.
customer_reviews.author: JCH

customer_reviews.title: So pretty, nice and thick paper!!
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper is so pretty and makes wrapping gifts that much more fun. The thickness is perfect, very easy to wrap. Having two options of which side to use is a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Brimhall

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Quality wrapping paper. We enjoy the options with the two sides.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.text: This is some of the best wrapping paper I have purchased! It’s thick enough to not rip on box corners but is still pliable to give a good crease on edges! I cannot believe how much I love the fact that the paper of reversible! It’s a benefit that I didn’t even know was missing in my other wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love the thickness and durability of this wrapping paper. Reversible prints are a bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great options
customer_reviews.text: I like to wrap each present in a different design so this is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Paper
customer_reviews.text: The rolls look very nice. I should be able to wrap gifts nicely now.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Hogebaum

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, nice print, and I love that they are reversible.
customer_reviews.author: ArtChar

customer_reviews.title: Wrapping paper
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality wrapping paper with nice patterns on both sides
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn H. Hess

customer_reviews.title: Solid Wrapping Paper
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly what your looking for. Nothing fancy, classic designs, simply good wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Weithorn

customer_reviews.title: Great quantity
customer_reviews.text: This wrapping paper has a good bit of quantity. The colors are great.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Package was opened.
customer_reviews.text: One of the rolls looked like it was ripped open. The gift wraps are nice and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: mubina

customer_reviews.title: Thick sturdy paper
customer_reviews.text: Works great for little girl birthday presents and nice thick paper.
customer_reviews.author: seville malis

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrapping Paper
customer_reviews.text: Nice weight, easy to cut, very cute paper. Love that it’s reversible!
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Hallmark items are always good, especially their wrapping paper. These are reversible so they don't have the lines on the back of the paper to use as a guide while cutting the paper. But, as always, the colors are pretty and the paper is pretty sturdy. I'd definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie L. Waidler

customer_reviews.title: Thick paper, very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality and very happy for the versatility. This has more bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.author: Luke A Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Quality paper for a really reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: You get 6 rolls with 12 designs! They coordinate and look really good if you are giving someone multiple gifts. The paper is like expensive paper and fold well to make creases. I was surprised at how little it cost and how much is on a roll
customer_reviews.author: raga

customer_reviews.title: Cute and versatile
customer_reviews.text: Great wrapping paper. Love that it’s reversible to give even more options. Sturdy and cute. Will buy this again for holiday and birthday. Comes in nice box to store in too
customer_reviews.author: Jboshea

customer_reviews.title: Heavy paper
customer_reviews.text: High quality heavy wrapping paper. Very easy to work with and the reversible print is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: xDebx

customer_reviews.title: Great Wrapping Paper
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and being reversible makes it as if you get two rolls in one.
customer_reviews.author: AZTROGRS

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute Prints
customer_reviews.text: Great Hallmark quality and really cute prints. I've been shopping Hallmark for over 40 years and still love their products!
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: Great wrapping paper!
customer_reviews.text: I really like that it was reversible.It gives more variety for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathon Carter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: i love the reversible sides. Can use for just about any occasion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get a lot, and they’re cute!
customer_reviews.text: These were such cute patterns and we won’t have to buy more wrapping paper for a couple years!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: You Can't  Go  Wrong With  Hallmark Quality
customer_reviews.text: This Wrap Is Thumbs UP! Affordable and Great Quality. I won't buy anything else now. Nice that you can choose what design on either side of your wrap, Great Chose!
customer_reviews.author: DLDpa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy wrapping paper.
customer_reviews.text: I got this paper to have on hand for my granddaughters birthdays. I love that each roll is two sided. The paper is thick so it doesn’t tear or pop through the corners.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Klinger

customer_reviews.title: Hallmark quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this paper, I have used both sides of all three rolls. Each time compliments. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: NanaNan

customer_reviews.title: Lots of options to have at home, for bdays coming up.
customer_reviews.text: Great to have at home for different birthdays that come up. Cute, durable and plenty of options.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: High quality paper
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice set of wrapping paper. The thickness definitely makes it higher quality than most paper that you can buy in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I loved the dual sided paper, but I missed the grid to help keep your lines straight
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful paper
customer_reviews.text: Heavyweight and looks great! Reversible, so you have six coordinating papers.
customer_reviews.author: casnfl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The paper had a nice thickness and all of them were reversible!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Waltmon

customer_reviews.title: Reversible
customer_reviews.text: The quality was good and paper for all occasions but a little expensive
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hallmark Reversible Wrapping Paper, Flowers and Cupcakes (Pack of 3, 120 sq. ft. ttl.) for Birthdays, Easter, Mothers Day or Any Occasion
product_meta.description: Color:Birthday Flowers and CupcakesThe perfect way to present birthday, Easter, Mother's Day, graduation, baby shower, get well, and many other gifts in style to friends and family. Great for all types of occasions. Six designs in total, including 'Happy Birthday' in pink and pastels, pink tonal stripes, cupcakes with sprinkles, black and white flowers, multi-colored polka dots on light blue, and a solid yellow. Each roll in this reversible wrapping paper set measures 30 inches wide by 16 feet long for a total of 40 square feet per roll. 120 total square feet. Created with high-quality paper materials, all Hallmark wrapping paper is made with paper from well-managed forests. Made in the USA. Purchase includes three rolls of reversible wrapping paper, each featuring two different designs for a total of six unique designs, perfect for beautiful and varied gift presentations.
feature_bullets: Each roll in this 3-pack of reversible wrapping paper measures 30 inches wide by 16 feet long for a total of 40 square feet per roll. 120 total square feet in the set.

Six designs in total: "Happy Birthday" in pink and pastels, pink tonal stripes, cupcakes with sprinkles on pink background, black and white flowers, multi-colored polka dots on light blue, and a solid yellow.
Purchase includes 3 rolls of reversible wrapping paper, each featuring 2 different designs for a total of 6 unique designs, perfect for beautiful and varied gift presentations.
The perfect way to celebrate birthdays, graduations, baby showers, Easter, Mother's Day and other holidays throughout the year. Great to have on hand for all types of occasions.
Created with high-quality paper materials, all Hallmark wrapping paper is made with paper from well-managed forests. Made in the USA.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars521 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
